categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War
Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War in 0 ABY, a rescue mission was undertaken by a team from the Alliance to Restore the Republic. They fought a band of Imperial stormtroopers, and the forces of Grakkus the Hutt. The battle took place on Nar Shaddaa, the "smuggler's moon.
